and remember when we said to the angel prostrate yourselves unto adam they prostrated themselves except iblis he said shall prostrate myself to one whom you created from clay
he said see this one whom you have honored above me if you give me respite to the day of resurrection will surely seize and mislead his offspring all but few
allah said go and whosoever of them follows you surely hell will be the recompense of you all an ample recompense

and fool them gradually those whom you can among them with your voice ajlib upon them with your cavalry and your infantry share with them wealth and child and make promise to them but shaytan promise them nothing but deceit
verily my servant you have no authority over them and all sufficient is your lord a guardian
your lord is he who drive the ship for you through the sea in order that you may seek of his bounty truly he is ever most merciful towards you
and when harm touch you upon the sea those that you call upon vanish from you except him but when he brings you safe to land you turn away and man is ever ungrateful
do you then feel secure that he will not cause side of the land to swallow you up or that he will not send against you hasib then you shall find no guardian
or do you feel secure that he will not send you back second time to sea and send against you qasif and drown you because of your disbelief then you will not find any avenger therein against u

and indeed we have honored the child of adam and we have carried them on land and sea and have provided them with at tayyibat and have preferred them above many of those whom we have created with marked preferment

and remember the day when we shall call together all human being with their respective imam the book of deed so whosoever is given his record in his right hand such will read their record and they will not be dealt with unjustly in the least
and whoever is blind in this world then he will be blind in the hereafter and most astray from the path
verily they were about to tempt you away from that which we have revealed to you to fabricate something other than it against u and then they would certainly have taken you a an intimate friend
and had we not made you stand firm you would nearly have inclined to them little
in that case we would have made you taste double portion in this life and double portion after death and then you would have found none to help you against u
and verily they were about to frighten you so much a to drive you out from the land but in that case they would not have stayed therein after you except for little while
sunnah with which we sent our messenger before you and you will not find any alteration in our sunnah
perform the salah from midday till the darkness of the night and recite the qur an in the early dawn verily the recitation of the qur an in the early dawn is ever witnessed
and in some part of the night also offer the salah with it a an additional prayer for you it may be that your lord will raise you to maqam mahmud
and say my lord let my entry be good and likewise my exit be good and grant me from you helping authority
and say truth ha come and falsehood ha vanished surely falsehood is ever bound to vanish
and we send down of the qur an that which is cure and mercy to the believer and it increase the wrongdoer in nothing but loss
and when we bestow our grace on man he turn away and becomes arrogant and when evil touch him he is in great despair
say each one doe according to shakilatihi and your lord know best of him whose path is right
and they ask you concerning the ruh the spirit say the ruh the spirit is one of the thing the knowledge of which is only with my lord and of knowledge you mankind have been given only little
and if we willed we could surely take away that which we have revealed to you then you would find no protector for you against u in that respect
except a mercy from your lord verily his grace unto you is ever great
say if mankind and the jinni were together to produce the like of this qur an they could not produce the like thereof even if they helped one another
and indeed we have fully explained to mankind in this qur an every kind of similitude but most of mankind refuse the truth and accept nothing but disbelief
and they say we shall not believe in you until you cause spring to gush forth from the earth for u
or you have garden of date palm and grape and cause river to gush forth in their midst abundantly
or you cause the heaven to fall upon u in piece a you have pretended or you bring allah and the angel before u face to face

or you have house of zukhruf or you ascend up into the sky and even then we will put no faith in your ascension until you bring down for u book that we would read say glorified be my lord am anything but man sent a messenger
and nothing prevented men from believing when the guidance came to them except that they said ha allah sent man a his messenger
say if there were on the earth angel walking about in peace and security we should certainly have sent down for them from the heaven an angel a messenger
say sufficient is allah for witness between me and you verily he is ever the all knower the all seer of his servant

and he whom allah guide he is led aright and whomever he leaf astray can never find helper other than him and we shall gather them together on the day of resurrection on their face blind dumb and deaf their abode will be hell whenever it abates we shall increase for them the fierceness of the fire
that is their recompense because they denied our ayat and said when we are bone and fragment shall we really be raised up a new creation

see they not that allah who created the heaven and the earth is able to create the like of them and he ha decreed for them an appointed term whereof there is no doubt but the wrongdoer refuse but disbelief
say if you possessed the treasure of the mercy of my lord then you would surely hold back for fear of spending and man is ever miserly
and indeed we gave musa nine clear sign ask then the child of israel when he came to them then fir awn said to him musa think you are indeed bewitched
he said verily you know that these sign have been sent down by none but the lord of the heaven and the earth and think you are indeed fir awn doomed to destruction
so he resolved to turn them out of the land but we drowned him and all who were with him
and we said to the child of israel after him dwell in the land then when the final and the last promise come near we shall bring you altogether a mixed crowd
and with truth we have sent it down and with truth it ha descended and we have sent you a nothing but bearer of glad tidings and warner
and qur an which we have divided into part in order that you might recite it to men at interval and we have revealed it by stage
say believe in it or do not believe in it verily those who were given knowledge before it when it is recited to them fall down on their chin face in humble prostration
and they say glory be to our lord truly the promise of our lord must be fulfilled
and they fall down on their chin face weeping and it increase their humility

say invoke allah or invoke ar rahman the most gracious by whatever name you invoke him it is the same for to him belong the best name and offer your salah prayer neither aloud nor in low voice but follow way between
and say all the praise and thanks be to allah who ha not begotten son and who ha no partner in his dominion nor is he low to have supporter and magnify him with all magnificence
all praise is due to allah who ha sent down to his servant the book and ha not placed therein any crookedness
he ha made it straight to give warning of severe punishment from him and to give good news to the believer who do righteous deed that they shall have fair reward
they shall abide therein forever
and to warn those who say allah ha begotten child
no knowledge have they of such thing nor had their father mighty is the word that come out of their mouth they utter nothing but lie
perhaps you would kill yourself in grief over their footstep because they believe not in this narration
verily we have made that which is on earth an adornment for it in order that we may test which of them are best in deed
and verily we shall make all that is on it bare dry soil
do you think that the people of al kahf and ar raqim were wonder among our sign
when the young men fled for refuge to al kahf they said our lord bestow on u mercy from yourself and facilitate for u our affair in the right way
therefore we covered up their hearing in al kahf for number of year
then we raised them up that we might test which of the two party wa best at calculating the time period they tarried
we narrate unto you their story with truth truly they were young men who believed in their lord allah and we increased them in guidance

and we made their heart firm and strong when they stood up and said our lord is the lord of the heaven and the earth never shall we call upon any god other than him if we did we should indeed have uttered an enormity in disbelief
these our people have taken for worship god other than him why do they not bring for them clear authority and who doe more wrong than he who invents lie against allah

the young men said to one another and when you withdraw from them and that which they worship except allah then seek refuge in the cave your lord will open way for you from his mercy and will make easy for you your affair

and you might have seen the sun when it rose declining to the right from their cave and when it set turning away from them to the left while they lay in the midst of the cave that is from the ayat of allah he whom allah guide he is the rightly guided but he whom he sends astray for him you will find no guardian to lead him

and you would have thought them awake whereas they were asleep and we turned them on their right and on their left side and their dog stretching forth his two foreleg at the wasid had you happened upon them you would certainly have turned back from them in flight and would certainly have been filled with awe of them

likewise we woke them that they might question one another speaker among them said how long have you stayed here they said we have stayed day or part of day they said your lord know best how long you have stayed here so send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the town and let him find out which is the azka food and bring some of that to you and let him be careful and let no man know of you
for if they come to know of you they will stone you or turn you back to their religion and in that case you will never be successful

and thus we made their case known that they might know that the promise of allah is true and that there can be no doubt about the hour remember when they the people disputed among themselves about their case they said construct building over them their lord know best about them then those who won their point said we verily shall build place of worship over them

they say they were three the dog being the fourth among them and they say they were five the dog being the sixth guessing at the unseen and they say they were seven and the dog being the eighth say my lord know best their number none know them but few so debate not except with the clear proof and consult not any of them about the people of the cave
and never say of anything shall do such and such thing tomorrow
except with the saying if allah will and remember your lord when you forget and say it may be that my lord guide me to nearer way of truth than this
and they stayed in their cave three hundred year adding nine

say allah know best how long they stayed with him is the unseen of the heaven and the earth how clearly he see and hears everything they have no protector other than him and he make none to share in his decision and his rule
and recite what ha been revealed to you muhammad of your lord book none can change his word and none will you find a refuge other than him

and keep yourself muhammad patiently with those who call on their lord morning and afternoon seeking his face and let not your eye overlook them desiring the pomp and glitter of the life of the world and obey not him whose heart we have made heedless of our remembrance and who follows his own lust and whose affair ha been lost

and say the truth is from your lord then whosoever will let him believe and whosoever will let him disbelieve verily we have prepared for the wrongdoer fire whose wall will be surrounding them and if they ask for drink they will be granted water like al muhl that will scald their face terrible is the drink and an evil murtafaq
verily a for those who believed and did righteous deed certainly we shall not make the reward of anyone to be lost who doe his righteous deed in the most perfect manner

these for them will be jannatu adn wherein river flow beneath them therein they will be adorned with bracelet of gold and they will wear green garment of sundus and istabraq they will be muttaki in therein on ara ik how good is the reward and what an excellent murtafaq
and put forward to them the example of two men unto one of them we had given two garden of grape and we had surrounded both with date palm and had put between them green crop cultivated field
each of those two garden brought forth it produce and failed not in the least therein and we caused river to gush forth in the midst of both
and he had thamar and he said to his companion in the course of discussion am greater than you in wealth and have mightier entourage
and he went into his garden while having been unjust to himself he said do not think that this will ever perish
and do not think the hour will ever come and if indeed am brought back to my lord surely shall find better than this when return to him
his companion said to him during his discussion do you disbelieve in him who created you out of dust then out of nutfah then fashioned you into man
but a for my part believe that he is allah my lord and none shall associate a partner with my lord
it wa better for you to say when you entered your garden that which allah will there is no power but with allah if you see me le than you in wealth and child
it may be that my lord will give me something better than your garden and will send on it husban from the sky then it will be a barren slippery earth
or the water thereof becomes ghawran so that you will never be able to seek it

and he had no group of men to help him against allah nor could he defend or save himself
there on the day of resurrection al walayah will be for allah alone the true god he allah is the best for reward and the best for the final end

and mention the parable of the worldly life it is like the water which we send down from the sky and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and becomes fresh and green but later it becomes dry and broken piece which the wind scatter and allah is able to do everything
wealth and child are the adornment of the life of this world but the good righteous deed that last are better with your lord for reward and better for hope
and remember the day we shall cause the mountain to pas away and you will see the earth a levelled plain and we shall gather them so that we will leave not one of them behind
and they will be set before your lord aligned he will say now indeed you have come to u a we created you the first time nay but you thought that we had appointed no meeting for you with u

and the book will be produced and you will see the criminal fearful of that which is therein they will say woe to u what sort of book is this that leaf neither small thing nor large thing but ha recorded it with number and they will find all that they did present and your lord treat no one with injustice

and remember when we said to the angel prostrate yourselves unto adam so they prostrated themselves except iblis he wa one of the jinni he disobeyed the command of his lord will you then take him and his offspring a protector and helper rather than me while they are enemy to you what an evil is the exchange for the wrongdoer
they did not witness the creation of the heaven and the earth nor their own creation nor did take those who mislead a adudan
and remember the day he will say call those so called partner of mine whom you claimed then they will cry unto them but they will not answer them and we shall put mawbiq between them
and the criminal shall see the fire and apprehend that they are to fall therein and they will find no way of escape from it
and indeed we have given every kind of example in this qur an for mankind but man is ever more quarrelsome than anything

and nothing prevents men from believing while the guidance ha come to them and from asking forgiveness of their lord except that the way of the ancient be repeated with them or the torment be brought to them face to face

and we send not the messenger except a bearer of good news and warner but those who disbelieve argue with falsehood in order to refute the truth thereby and they take my ayat and that which they are warned for jest

and who doe more wrong than he who is reminded of the ayat sign of his lord but turn away from them forgetting what his hand have sent forth truly we have set over their heart akinnah lest they should understand this the qur an and in their ear deafness and if you call them to guidance even then they will never be guided

and your lord is most forgiving owner of mercy were he to call them to account for what they have earned then surely he would have hastened their punishment but they have their appointed time beyond which they will find no escape
and these town we destroyed them when they did wrong and we appointed fixed time for their destruction
and remember when musa said to his boy servant will not give up until reach the junction of the two sea or huqub pass
but when they reached the junction of the two sea they forgot their fish and it took it way through the sea a in tunnel
so when they passed further on musa said to his boy servant bring u our morning meal truly we have suffered nasaban in this our journey
he said do you remember when we betook ourselves to the rock indeed forgot the fish none but shaytan made me forget to remember it it took it course into the sea in strange way
musa said that is what we have been seeking so they went back retracing their footstep
then they found one of our servant on whom we had bestowed mercy from u and whom we had taught knowledge from u
musa said to him may follow you so that you teach me something of that knowledge which you have been taught by allah
he said verily you will not be able to have patience with me

musa said if allah will you will find me patient and will not disobey you in aught
he said then if you follow me ask me not about anything till myself mention of it to you
so they both proceeded till when they boarded the boat he khidr damaged it musa said have you damaged it wherein it people will drown verily you have committed thing imr
he said did not tell you that you would not be able to have patience with me
he said call me not to account for what forgot and be not hard upon me for my affair with you
then they both proceeded till they met boy and he khidr killed him musa said have you killed an innocent person without nafs verily you have committed thing nukr
he said did not tell you that you can have no patience with me
he said if ask you anything after this keep me not in your company you have received an excuse from me

then they both proceeded till when they came to the people of town they asked them for food but they refused to entertain them then they found therein wall about to collapse and he set it up straight musa said if you had wished surely you could have taken wage for it
he said this is the parting between you and will tell you the interpretation of those thing over which you were not able to be patient
a for the boat it belonged to poor people working in the sea so wished to make defective damage in it a there wa king behind them who seized every boat by force
and a for the boy his parent were believer and we feared he would oppress them by rebellion and disbelief
so we intended that their lord should exchange him for them for one better in righteousness and nearer to mercy

and a for the wall it belonged to two orphan boy in the town and there wa under it treasure belonging to them and their father wa righteous man and your lord intended that they should attain their age of full strength and take out their treasure a mercy from your lord and did them not of my own accord that is the interpretation of those thing over which you could not be patient
and they ask you about dhul qarnayn say shall recite to you something of his story
verily we established him in the earth and we gave him the mean of everything
so he followed way
until when he reached the setting place of the sun he found it setting in spring of hami ah and he found near it people we said dhul qarnayn either you punish them or treat them with kindness
he said a for him who doe wrong we shall punish him and then he will be brought back unto his lord who will punish him with terrible torment hell
but a for him who belief and work righteousness he shall have the best reward and we shall speak unto him mild word
then he followed another way
until when he came to the rising place of the sun he found it rising on people for whom we allah had provided no shelter against the sun
so it wa and we knew all about him dhul qarnayn
then he followed another way
until when he reached between two mountain he found before them people who scarcely understood word
they said dhul qarnayn verily ya juj and ma juj are doing great mischief in the land shall we then pay you tribute in order that you might erect barrier between u and them
he said that in which my lord had established me is better so help me with strength will erect between you and them barrier
give me zubar of iron then when he had filled up the gap between the two mountain cliff he said blow then when he had made them red a fire he said bring me qitran to pour over them
so they could not scale it or dig through it
he said this is mercy from my lord but when the promise of my lord come he shall dakka it down to the ground and the promise of my lord is ever true
and on that day we shall leave some of them to surge like wave on one another and the trumpet will be blown and we shall collect them the creature all together
and on that day we shall present hell to the disbeliever plain to view
to those whose eye had been under covering from my reminder and they could not bear to hear it
do then those who disbelieved think that they can take my servant a awliya protector besides me verily we have prepared hell a an entertainment for the disbeliever
say shall we tell you the greatest loser in respect of their deed
those whose effort have been wasted in this life while they thought that they were acquiring good by their deed
they are those who deny the ayat of their lord and the meeting with him so their work are in vain and on the day of resurrection we shall assign no weight for them
that shall be their recompense hell because they disbelieved and took my ayat and my messenger for jest
verily those who believe and do righteous deed shall have the garden of al firdaws for their entertainment
wherein they shall dwell forever no desire will they have for removal therefrom
say if the sea were ink for the word of my lord surely the sea would be exhausted before the word of my lord would be finished even if we brought like it for it aid

say am only man like you it ha been revealed to me that your god is one god so whoever hope for the meeting with his lord let him work righteousness and associate none a partner in the worship of his lord
kaf ha ya ain sad
reminder of the mercy of your lord to his servant zakariyya
when he called his lord with call in secret
he said my lord indeed my bone have grown feeble and gray hair ha ashta al on my head and have never been unblessed in my invocation to you my lord
and verily fear mawali after me and my wife is barren so give me from yourself an heir
who shall inherit me and inherit also the posterity of ya qub and make him my lord one with whom you are well pleased
allah said zakariyya verily we give you the good news of son whose name will be yahya we have given that name to none before him
he said my lord how can have son when my wife is barren and have reached the extreme old age
he said thus your lord say it is easy for me certainly have created you before when you had been nothing
he zakariyya said my lord appoint for me sign he said your sign is that you shall not speak unto mankind for three night though having no bodily defect
then he came out to his people from the mihrab and he indicated to them by sign to glorify allah in the morning and in the afternoon
it wa said to his son yahya hold fast to the scripture and we gave him wisdom while yet child
and hananan from u and zakatan and he wa pious
and dutiful to his parent and he wa not arrogant or disobedient
and salam peace be on him the day he wa born and the day he dy and the day he will be raised up to life again
and mention in the book maryam when she withdrew in seclusion from her family to place facing east
she placed screen before them then we sent to her our ruh and he appeared before her in the form of man in all respect
she said verily seek refuge with the most gracious allah from you if you do fear allah
the angel said am only messenger from your lord to announce to you the gift of righteous son
she said how can have son when no man ha touched me nor am baghiyya
he said thus say your lord that is easy for me allah and we wish to appoint him a sign to mankind and mercy from u allah and it is matter already decreed by allah
so she conceived him and she withdrew with him to remote place
and the pain of childbirth drove her to the trunk of date palm she said would that had died before this and had been forgotten and out of sight
then he cried unto her from below her saying grieve not your lord ha provided sariy under you
and shake the trunk of date palm towards you it will let fall fresh ripe date upon you
so eat and drink and rejoice and if you see any human being say verily have vowed fast for the most gracious so shall not speak to any human being today
then she brought him to her people carrying him they said mary indeed you have brought thing fariy
sister of harun your father wa not man who used to commit adultery nor your mother wa an unchaste woman
then she pointed to him they said how can we talk to one who is child in the cradle
he said verily am servant of allah he ha given me the scripture and made me prophet
and he ha made me blessed wherever be and ha enjoined on me awsani salah and zakah a long a live
and to be dutiful to my mother and made me not arrogant unblessed
and salam peace be upon me the day wa born and the day die and the day shall be raised alive
such is isa son of maryam qawlal haqq it is statement of truth about which they doubt or dispute
it befits not the majesty of allah that he should beget son glorified be he when he decree thing he only say to it be and it is
isa said and verily allah is my lord and your lord so worship him that is the straight path
then the sect differed so woe unto the disbeliever from the meeting of great day
how clearly will they see and hear the day when they will appear before u but the wrongdoer today are in plain error
and warn them of the day of grief and regret when the case ha been decided while now they are in state of carelessness and they believe not
verily we will inherit the earth and whatsoever is thereon and to u they all shall be returned
and mention in the book ibrahim verily he wa man of truth prophet
when he said to his father my father why do you worship that which hears not see not and cannot avail you in anything
my father verily there ha come to me the knowledge of that which came not unto you so follow me will guide you to the straight path
my father worship not shaytan verily shaytan ha been rebel against the most gracious
my father verily fear lest torment from the most gracious should overtake you so that you become companion of shaytan
he the father said do you revile my god ibrahim if you stop not this will la arjumannak so get away from me maliyan
ibrahim said peace be on you will ask forgiveness of my lord for you verily he is unto me hafiyyan
and shall turn away from you and from those whom you invoke besides allah and shall call upon my lord and certainly hope that shall not be unblessed in my invocation to my lord
so when he had turned away from them and from those whom they worshipped besides allah we gave him ishaq and ya qub and each one of them we made prophet
and we gave them of our mercy and we granted them sidqin aliyyan on the tongue
and mention in the book musa verily he wa mukhlasan and he wa messenger and prophet
and we called him from the right side of the mount tur and made him draw near to u for talk with him
and we granted him his brother harun also prophet out of our mercy
and mention in the book isma il verily he wa true to what he promised and he wa messenger and prophet
and he would enjoin on his family and his people the salah and the zakah and his lord wa pleased with him
and mention in the book idris verily he wa man of truth and prophet
and we raised him to high station

those were they unto whom allah bestowed his grace from among the prophet of the offspring of adam and of those whom we carried in the ship with nuh and of the offspring of ibrahim and israel and from among those whom we guided and chose when the ayat of the most gracious were recited unto them they fell down prostrate and weeping
then there ha succeeded them posterity who have lost the salah and have followed lust so they will meet ghaiy
except those who repent and believe and work righteousness such will enter paradise and they will not be wronged in aught
they will enter adn garden which the most gracious ha promised to his servant in the unseen verily his promise must come to pas
they shall not hear therein any laghw but only salam and they will have therein their sustenance morning and afternoon
such is the paradise which we shall give a an inheritance to those of our servant who had taqwa
and we descend not except by the command of your lord to him belongs what is before u and what is behind u and what is between those two and your lord is never forgetful
lord of the heaven and the earth and all that is between them so worship him and abide patiently in his worship do you know of any who is similar to him
and man say when am dead shall then be raised up alive
doe not man remember that we created him before while he wa nothing
so by your lord surely we shall gather them together and also the shayatin then we shall bring them round hell jithyya
then indeed we shall drag out from every sect all those who were worst in obstinate rebellion against the most gracious
then verily we know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein
there is not one of you but will pas over it hell this is with your lord decree which must be accomplished
then we shall save those who had taqwa and we shall leave the wrongdoer in it jithiyya
and when our clear ayat are recited to them those who disbelieve say to those who believe which of the two group ha the best dwelling and the finest nadiyyan
and how many generation have we destroyed before them who were better in wealth good and outward appearance

say whoever is in error the most gracious will extend circumstance for him until when they see that which they were promised either the torment or the hour they will come to know who is worst in position and who is weaker in force
and allah increase in guidance those who walk aright and the righteous good deed that last are better with your lord for reward and better for resort
have you seen him who disbelieved in our ayat and said shall certainly be given wealth and child if live again
ha he known the unseen or ha he taken covenant from the most gracious
nay we shall record what he say and we shall increase his torment
and we shall inherit from him all that he speaks of and he shall come to u alone
and they have taken god besides allah that they might give them honor power and glory
nay but they will deny their worship of them and will become their adversary
see you not that we have sent the shayatin against the disbeliever to push them to do evil
so make no haste against them we only count out to them limited number
the day we shall gather those with taqwa unto the most gracious allah like delegation
and we shall drive the criminal to hell in thirsty state
none shall have the power of intercession but such one a ha received permission or promise from the most gracious allah
and they say the most gracious allah ha begotten son
indeed you have brought forth said thing idda
whereby the heaven are almost torn and the earth is split asunder and the mountain hadda
that they ascribe son to the most gracious
but it is not suitable for the most gracious that he should beget son
there is none in the heaven and the earth but come unto the most gracious a slave
verily he know each one of them and ha counted them full counting
and everyone of them will come to him alone on the day of resurrection
verily those who believe and work deed of righteousness the most gracious will bestow love for them
so we have made this easy in your own tongue only that you may give glad tidings to those who have taqwa and warn with it the people that are ludda
and how many generation before them have we destroyed can you find single one of them or hear even whisper of them
ta ha
we have not sent down the qur an unto you to cause you distress
but only a reminder to those who fear allah
revelation from him who created the earth and high heaven
the most gracious istawa the throne
to him belongs all that is in the heaven and all that is on the earth and all that is between them and all that is under the soil
and if you speak aloud then verily he know the secret and that which is yet more hidden
allah there is no god but him to him belong the best name
and ha there come to you the story of musa
when he saw fire he said to his family wait verily have seen fire perhaps can bring you some burning brand therefrom or find some guidance at the fire
and when he came to it the fire he wa called by name musa
verily am your lord so take off your shoe you are in the sacred valley tuwa
